post.title: Digest - Week 2023/40
post.body:
ㅤ
### [Announcing the GitHub Innovation Graph - The GitHub Blog](https://github.blog/2023-09-21-announcing-the-github-innovation-graph/)
Explore a universe of data about how the world is building software together on GitHub.
ㅤ
### [B2C Transactional Messaging. With Service Cloud, B2C Commerce, and… | by Nicolas Vanden Bossche | Salesforce Architects | Oct, 2023 | Medium](https://medium.com/salesforce-architects/b2c-transactional-messaging-3abd33742fc9)
Compare approaches to implement transactional messaging a B2C scenario using B2C Commerce, Marketing Cloud, and Service Cloud.
ㅤ
### [Effectively loading ads without impacting page speed](https://web.dev/loading-ads-page-speed/)
Learn how to effectively load ads without impacting your page speed, ensuring a seamless user experience, and maximizing revenue opportunities for website owners.
ㅤ
### [Bezel • Show your iPhone on your Mac](https://getbezel.app/)
Bezel mirrors your iPhone onto your Mac by just plugging it in. Beautifully designed for Mac, with ease of use in mind.
ㅤ
### [Photoshop is now on the web!. Enabled by WebAssembly, Web Components… | by Addy Osmani | Sep, 2023 | Medium](https://medium.com/@addyosmani/photoshop-is-now-on-the-web-38d70954365a)
Enabled by WebAssembly + Emscripten, Web Components + Lit, Service Workers + Workbox & new Web APIs. Chrome & Adobe enjoyed collaborating on it. Bringing the Photoshop desktop application to the web…
ㅤ
### [Using TypeScript – React](https://react.dev/learn/typescript)
TypeScript is a popular way to add type definitions to JavaScript codebases. Out of the box, TypeScript supports JSX and you can get full React Web support by adding @types/react and @types/react-dom to your project.
ㅤ
### [Non-engineers guide: Train a LLaMA 2 chatbot](https://huggingface.co/blog/Llama2-for-non-engineers)
We’re on a journey to advance and democratize artificial intelligence through open source and open science.
ㅤ
### [Ask HN: What software did you purchase that positively impacted your family life | Hacker News](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37759759)
Ask HN: What software did you purchase that positively impacted your family life | Hacker News
post.excerpt: Weekly digest of my readings and interesting topics. Week 40 of 2023.

ㅤ

Announcing the GitHub Innovation Graph - The GitHub Blog

Explore a universe of data about how the world is building software together on GitHub. ㅤ

B2C Transactional Messaging. With Service Cloud, B2C Commerce, and… | by Nicolas Vanden Bossche | Salesforce Architects | Oct, 2023 | Medium

Compare approaches to implement transactional messaging a B2C scenario using B2C Commerce, Marketing Cloud, and Service Cloud. ㅤ

Effectively loading ads without impacting page speed

Learn how to effectively load ads without impacting your page speed, ensuring a seamless user experience, and maximizing revenue opportunities for website owners. ㅤ

Bezel • Show your iPhone on your Mac

Bezel mirrors your iPhone onto your Mac by just plugging it in. Beautifully designed for Mac, with ease of use in mind. ㅤ

Photoshop is now on the web!. Enabled by WebAssembly, Web Components… | by Addy Osmani | Sep, 2023 | Medium

Enabled by WebAssembly + Emscripten, Web Components + Lit, Service Workers + Workbox & new Web APIs. Chrome & Adobe enjoyed collaborating on it. Bringing the Photoshop desktop application to the web… ㅤ

Using TypeScript – React

TypeScript is a popular way to add type definitions to JavaScript codebases. Out of the box, TypeScript supports JSX and you can get full React Web support by adding @types/react and @types/react-dom to your project. ㅤ
